findings.rationale: The two-year duration may be insufficient for certain types of sensitive information, potentially exposing parties to risks if information is misused after the period ends.
findings.evidence_quote: Confidentiality obligations shall continue for two (2) years after termination of discussions.

findings.risk_title: Lack of Specificity in Confidential Information Definition
findings.rationale: The broad definition of Confidential Information may lead to disputes over what is covered, increasing the risk of unintentional breaches.
findings.evidence_quote: Confidential Information means all proprietary information disclosed by one party to the other, including technical data, business strategies...
